entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
